name: Dungeon Esc
description:
Introduction:

Dungeon Esc  is a strategy based puzzle solving game in which player has to escape out from the dungeon. The player is trapped inside the dungeon and he has to escape by opening some doors inside the dungeon. The doors will only open if you will place an object on button.

This game was made for BYOG 2022.

How To Play:

1. You can move around in the world with respective "Arrow" keys.

2. You can jump using "Space Bar" key.

3. You can grab the objects using 'G' key.

4. You can release the objects using 'H' key.

PS : You must have heard of a quote "Never judge a book by its cover". 

But I am telling you, this time you should definitely judge a book by its cover.
